Discount Ratio = User collateral/Total c: Discount Ratio = User collateral/Total collateral amount
Free funds = (User collateral /Total col: Free funds = (User collateral /Total collateral amount) * Settlement transaction fee relief pool
Group Owners can reduce the transaction: Group Owners can reduce the transaction fees of work reporting for Group members by locking CRU. For each 3CRU locked up, the transaction fees can be reduced once for each Era. If the number of reduced transaction fees is exceeded, the transaction fee of Group members will be charged normally.
Lock CRU Tokens to obtain Storage Market: Lock CRU Tokens to obtain Storage Market Benefits
Lock CRU to reduce the transaction fees: Lock CRU to reduce the transaction fees of work reporting
Please wait for member account to report: Please wait for member account to report the first work report and then join the group
Select a contact or paste the group owne: Select a contact or paste the group owner you want to join.
Settlement Transaction Fee Relief Pool (: Settlement Transaction Fee Relief Pool (Current Era)
The account you will join group.
The account you will quit group.
The transaction fees will be subtracted: The transaction fees will be subtracted from the sender account.
The transferred balance will be subtract: The transferred balance will be subtracted (along with fees) from the sender account.
Type the amount you want to transfer. No: Type the amount you want to transfer. Note that you can select the unit on the right e.g sending 1 milli is equivalent to sending 0.001.
Type the collateral amount you want to b: Type the collateral amount you want to bond. Note that you can select the unit on the right e.g sending 1 milli is equivalent to sending 0.001.
Users can obtain storage order discounts: Users can obtain storage order discounts and reductions of order settlement transaction fees by locking CRU tokens as storage market collateral. As a storage merchant, the collateral is a necessary condition for receiving the storage market income. The collateal can obtain the same amount of income limit, accumulated storage market income will not increase after the  reaches the income limit, and the storage merchant needs to get income in time.
